turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Where is a Starbucks near me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I found a Starbucks at 422 West 500 South. Would you like to place an order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, will you be picking this up now or later?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Later

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, first - what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti House blend, add cream and two splenda's

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, to confirm, that is a Venti House blend, add cream and two splenda's, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, how soon will you be able to pick up the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 10 Minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I will place your order now and inform the barista to have it ready in 10 minutes. Will you be walking in or going through the drive thru?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Walk in.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, would you like any other items from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: An old fashioned donut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, one old fashioned donut. Is there anything else you would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, Your Venti House blend, add cream and two splenda's and old fashioned donut will be ready for pickup via walkin. Your total will be $5.85. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.
